Perfect Guardian's Pounce.name: Perfect Guardian's Pounce
Perfect Guardian's Pounce.flavor: You leap forward to absorb an attack meant for your friend.
Perfect Guardian's Pounce.trigger: A melee or a ranged attack hits an ally within 5 squares of you
Perfect Guardian's Pounce.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to twice your speed to a square adjacent to the creature that made the triggering attack. The attack hits you instead, and you mark the creature that made it until the end of your next turn.
